metadata.name: Job String
metadata.value: Business & Sales Operations.Business Operations.Business Operations Manager

title: Associate Partner Sales Operations
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Associate Partner Sales Operations
Location: Taguig City, Philippines
 
The Associate Partner Sales Operations is responsible for the collection, analysis, and reporting of services & operations-related data in an ongoing effort to increase overall services productivity. This position monitors and maintains services & operations-related data through both active modification and process improvements. The development and tracking of key performance indicators will be critical to enhancing the understanding of the business and improving decision-making. The Associate Partner Sales Operations provides overall support to the services & operations team.
 
The Associate Partner Sales Operations creates both standardized & custom reports/dashboards, conducts quantitative services & operations analysis, and assesses future needs and data integrity.  He/she must utilize and develop standardized tools, methodologies, and business processes aimed at improving operational efficiency.
 
As a Associate Partner Sales Operations, a Typical Day Might Include the Following:
 
 

Assist services representatives in gathering data, creating reports and dashboards
Create and distribute analytical reports including ad hoc and custom reports for services
Salesforce administration. ie: maintaining data integrity
Audit accounts, opportunities, projects, cases, etc. in CRM and partner with account owners to ensure data integrity
Project Management for projects submitted or related to services owned software
Create services process documentation and identify/lead improvement initiatives
Assist in data amendments and perform data clean up in CRM System
Follow the company Code of Ethics and NICE policies and procedures at all times.
Communicate in an effective and professional way with customers in and outside of NICE.

 
To Land This Gig You'll Need:
 

Bachelor's Degree in Business, Economics, Statistics or related field or equivalent work experience required.
3-5 years of experience with data analysis and written analysis
Excellent problem-solving skills
Ability to apply a wide range of business skills and analysis to the function
Ability to effectively prioritize and adjust to multiple demands
Proficient in Microsoft Office Tools
Advanced Microsoft Excel skills
Effective interpersonal skills. Able to communicate effectively across all levels of management
Strict attention to detail
Excellent organization skills
Salesforce report building and CRM administration​

 
Experience Preferred
 

Salesforce.com Administration
Experience in a Services Operations environment
SaaS business experience
B to B experience
About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.

questions.label: Do you have any first-degree relatives (spouse, parent, child, sibling) that are currently employed by NICE or any of its subsidiaries?
Have you ever worked at NICE or any of it's subsidiaries?
Current Address (Full address, City, Region, Zip)
How did you hear about this position opening?

Were you referred to this position by any current NICE employee? 
If Yes, what is the name of the first person to refer you? If No, please type "N/A."
Are you amenable to a hybrid work schedule (3 days WFH and 2 days onsite)?
Are you open to working night shifts?
Are you amenable to working in BGC, Taguig City?
